column2: Neuberger Berman Municipal Fund Inc, formerly Neuberger Berman Intermediate Municipal Fund Inc., is a diversified, closed-end management investment company that invests primarily in municipal securities. The Fund's investment objective is to provide a high level of current income exempt from regular federal income tax. It invests approximately 80% of total assets in municipal bonds with remaining maturities of less than 15 years and seeks to maintain a dollar weighted average duration between three and eight years. Its investment portfolio includes revenue bonds, general obligations, pre-refunded bonds and short-term investments. Its investment portfolio by state and territory includes Alabama, Missouri, Nevada, Arizona, California, New Jersey, Colorado, New Mexico, New York, Florida, Georgia, Guam, Hawaii, Indiana, Iowa, Maine, Maryland, Massachusetts, Michigan, Mississippi, Minnesota, Wisconsin and Washington. The Fund's investment manager is Neuberger Berman Investment Advisers LLC.
